titleStmt.title: Lovell H. Rousseau to Beriah Magoffin
CWG1413

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1859-1862

body.p:
Louisville Ky.
July 10. 1861.
His Excellency
Gov. Magoffin
Dear Sir,
I have concluded to serve my County in a different capacity from that of a Senator of Kentucky. and therefore resign my seat in the Senate of Kentucky

15. Senatorial District
L. H. Rousseau
Proclamation Issd
July 12. 1861
